title: Denso - global revenue 2008 to 2019
yAxis: Net sales in million Japanese yen
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Fiscal year, and Net sales in million Japanese yen in each Fiscal year on the y axis.
The maximum Net sales in million Japanese yen 5362772.0 is found at Fiscal year 2019 and the minimum is found at 2010 where Fiscal year is 2976709.0.
There is a difference of 2386063.0 between the maximum Fiscal year 2019 and minimum Fiscal year 2010.

The maximum Net sales in million Japanese yen 5362772.0 is found at Fiscal year 2019 and the minimum is found at 2010 where Fiscal year is 2976709.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales in million Japanese yen for 12 number of Fiscal years.
Fiscal year 2019 has the highest Net sales in million Japanese yen and 2010 has the lowest Net sales in million Japanese yen.
The second highest Net sales in million Japanese yen is appeared to be the Fiscal year 2018.
The difference of Net sales in million Japanese yen between the highest and lowest Fiscal year is 2386063.0.
Net sales in million Japanese yen at Fiscal year 2019 is 5362772.0 , second place is 2018 at 5108291.0, and thirdly is 2017 at 4527148.0.
The Fiscal year 2010 has 1.34 times less Net sales in million Japanese yen than average.
